profile.title: Faʻamatalaga a le tagata faʻaoga
profile.mustLogin: E tatau ona e saini i totonu e vaʻai i seti.
profile.showOriginalWithTranslation: Faʻaali le uluaʻi feʻau ma le faaliliuga
profile.showOriginalAndTranslation: Faʻaali faatasi le uluaʻi ma le faaliliuga
profile.autoDeleteSeconds: Sekone seʻia oʻo i le tape otometi
profile.saveError: Sese: Le mafai ona sefe seti.
profile.uploadAvatar: La'u i luga se ata fou
profile.avatarSuccess: Ua la'u i luga le ata!
profile.avatarError: Sese i le la'u i luga o le ata.
profile.noPrivateKey: Leai se ki tumaoti i luga o lenei masini e auina atu.
profile.setBackupPassword: Fa'atulaga se upu fa'ailo e fa'ailogaina ai lau fa'amaumauga:
profile.exportFailed: Le manuia le auina atu o le ki
profile.enterBackupPassword: Ulufale le upu fa'ailo mo lenei fa'amaumauga:
profile.importSuccess: Ua aumai le ki tumaoti i lenei masini.
profile.importFailed: Le manuia le aumaiga (upu fa'ailo sese po'o faila ua fa'aleagaina).
profile.keysRotated: Ua faia se paga ki fou ma la'u i luga le ki lautele.
profile.keyDisclaimer: E le tuua lava e lau ki tumaoti lenei masini. Auina atu se kopi fa'ailo e toe fa'afo'i i se isi masini.
profile.themeFreeNotice: O loʻo e faʻaaogaina le Fuafuaga Saʻoloto — faʻaaoga filifiliga vave o le La / Masina i lalo. Faʻaleleia e tatala isi autu.
profile.sunTheme: Fa'aoga le autu o le taeao
profile.moonTheme: Fa'aoga le autu o le po (Midnight)
profile.backupDesc: Fausia fa'amaumauga e puipuia i le upu fa'ailo mo au ki ma toe fa'afo'i i se isi masini e fa'afetaui.
profile.privacyBlurEnabled: Fa'afoliga fe'au i le tulaga masani
profile.privacyBlurOnUnfocus: Fa'afoliga pe a le taulai le polokalama
profile.notifyOnCopy: Fa'ailoa a'u pe a kopiina la'u fe'au
profile.loadFailed: Le mafai ona uta le fa'amatalaga
profile.unfollowFailed: Le mafai ona taofia le mulimuli
profile.followHint: O a latou tala o le a faʻaalia i lau fafaga Mulimuli pe a latou lolomiina i le vaega Mulimuli (poʻo Lautele).
profile.userNotFound: Le mafai ona maua le tagata faʻaoga
profile.followsYou: O lo'o mulimuli mai ia te oe
profile.sectionCrashedTitle: Le mafai ona uta le vaega
profile.sectionCrashedBody: Sa i ai se mea sese i lenei vaega.
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Fa'ao'o telefoni ma fe'au o lo'o ulufale i lau telefoni po'o imeli ua fa'amaonia. E mafai e telefoni/fe'au o lo'o alu atu ona faʻaali lau numera Chatforia.

chat.selectPrompt: Filifili se feʻau po'o se potu talatalanoa e amata ai le talanoaga
